description: This rule looks for Windows Installer service (msiexec.exe) spawned command line and/or powershell Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea), Mangatas Tondang (rule), oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Always Install Elevated MSI Spawned Cmd And Powershell
query: (process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe) AND process.parent.executable:*\\Windows\\Installer\\* AND process.parent.executable:*msi* AND process.parent.executable:*tmp)
